overview: Clara, a mother of two teenagers, is a woman open to new experiences who decides to create a profile on TILINK, a dating app. What goes through the mind of a twenty-something when she finds her own mother's profile on Tilink, the trendy dating app? Yes, his mother is still young. Yes, she's divorced from her father and has the right to rebuild her life, but.... Doesn't she know what Tilink is? There are only guys who are going to use her and then dump her, sex snipers... like himself. Dani and his sister Milena will embark on the delirious adventure of boycotting their mother's flirtations, and will go all out when the woman starts a more serious relationship with an Argentine yogurt man, convinced that he will only make her suffer. Only that the brothers' strategies will have the opposite effect to the desired one, there will be more and more men in their mother's life and nothing will turn out as they expect.
title: Mamá no enRedes
